studies.findings: Both kidneys show reduced size (right kidney 9.2 cm, left kidney 9.5 cm). Increased cortical echogenicity bilaterally consistent with chronic kidney disease. No hydronephrosis or masses identified.
Mild cardiomegaly. No acute pulmonary infiltrates. Small bilateral pleural effusions.
studies.impression: Mild cardiomegaly with small pleural effusions, likely related to volume overload
